purpose: Standardized framework for making advancement or sunsetting decisions for projects

stageGates.description: Validating the basic concept and problem-solution fit

advancementCriteria.description: Evidence that the problem exists and is significant
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Documented problem validation from at least 10 potential customers
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Strong validation from 20+ potential customers with quantified impact

advancementCriteria.description: Evidence that the proposed solution approach is viable
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Positive feedback on solution concept from 50%+ of interviewed prospects
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Enthusiastic response from 70%+ of prospects with willingness to engage further

advancementCriteria.description: Assessment of technical ability to deliver the solution
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: No major technical blockers identified, clear development path

advancementCriteria.description: Validation of market size and accessibility
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Identified market segment with sufficient size and accessibility
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Detailed market analysis with validated entry strategy

decision.advance: Proceed to MVP Development with appropriate resources
decision.pivot: Refine concept based on feedback and revalidate

stageGates.description: Building and validating minimum viable product

advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: MVP with essential features functional and tested
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Complete MVP with positive usability testing results

advancementCriteria.description: Commitment from initial customers to use the product
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: 5+ committed early adopters with diverse use cases

advancementCriteria.description: Evidence of actual product usage and engagement
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Regular usage by early adopters with basic engagement metrics
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Strong engagement metrics with evidence of value delivery

advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: System meets basic performance requirements with acceptable reliability
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: System exceeds performance targets with high reliability

decision.advance: Proceed to Market Validation with increased resources
decision.extend: Continue MVP development with specific improvements
decision.pivot: Significant product direction change based on feedback

stageGates.description: Validating product-market fit and initial commercialization

advancementCriteria.description: Ability to acquire customers beyond early adopters
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Demonstrated ability to acquire customers through repeatable process
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Growing customer base with increasing acquisition efficiency

advancementCriteria.description: Ability to generate revenue from the product
Evidence of value delivery and customer satisfaction
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Positive customer feedback and basic success metrics
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Strong success metrics with documented customer outcomes

advancementCriteria.description: Economic viability of the business model
advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Path to positive unit economics identified
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Demonstrated positive unit economics or clear path with timeline

decision.advance: Proceed to Scaling with significant resource investment
decision.optimize: Continue market validation with focus on improving key metrics
decision.pivot: Significant business model adjustment based on market feedback

stageGates.description: Expanding the business with proven product-market fit

advancementCriteria.minimumThreshold: Clear path to profitability with acceptable metrics
advancementCriteria.targetThreshold: Strong financial performance with improving metrics
Growing market leadership and brand recognition

decision.sustain: Maintain current scaling approach with ongoing optimization
decision.consolidate: Focus on profitability and operational excellence
decision.divest: Consider strategic options including sale or spinoff

evaluationProcess.frequency: Formal stage gate reviews at completion of each stage
documentation: Timeline and key milestones for next stage if advancing
